mapper.select: SELECT t.tour_name, t.tour_period, b.book_date, re.review_uid, re.review_title, m.member_name, b.book_uid FROM member m , tour t, book b, review re WHERE m.member_uid = b.member_uid and b.tour_uid = t.tour_uid and b.book_uid = re.book_uid AND m.member_uid = #{member_uid} ORDER BY b.book_uid DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT a.activ_name, a.activ_loc, re.review_uid, re.review_title, m.member_name, b.book_uid FROM member m , activ a, book b, review re, ticket t WHERE m.member_uid = b.member_uid and b.book_uid = re.review_uid and a.activ_uid = t.activ_uid AND m.member_uid = #{member_uid} ORDER BY b.book_uid DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10

SELECT i.inn_name, r.room_name, i.inn_sep , re.review_uid, re.review_title, m.member_name, b.book_uid FROM member m join book b on m.member_uid = b.member_uid join room r on b.room_uid = r.room_uid join review re on b.book_uid = re.book_uid join inn i on i.inn_uid = r.inn_uid AND m.member_uid = #{member_uid} ORDER BY b.book_uid DESC LIMIT #{page}, 10
